short_description: Hubcentric Wheel Spacers - Fits vehicles with 5/114.3 (5/4.5") bolt pattern and 60.1mm Centerbore. Compatible with Scion 2011-2016 tC, 2008-2015 xB. Compatible with Toyota Avalon, Camry, RAV4, MR2, Solara, Supra, Tacoma. Compatible with Lexus ES300h ES330 ES350 GS300 GS350 GS400 GS430 IS250 IS300 IS300 IS350. Also compatible with Lexus LS400 LS430 NX200t NX300 NX300h SC300 SC400 SC430. Check Year/Make/Model in Description. Check Year/Make/Model in Description.

[VERIFY FITMENT] Even if a vehicle is listed as being compatible, buyers still need to check: 1) You have 5mm of space between your fender and your wheel/tire; 2) Your studs/bolts are the correct length to ensure safe nut/bolt thread engagement; 3) For proper installation you may need aftermarket Extended Lug Bolts or Extended Wheel Studs (NOTE: NOT INCLUDED with this listing); 4) Wheels will center around vehicle's hub lip as long as it is longer than 5mm.

[SPECIFICATIONS] Two (2) Wheel Spacers with No Lip | Thickness: 5mm Wide | Bolt Pattern: 5x114.3 (5x4.5") | Hub Center Bore: 60.1mm | Extended Lug Bolts / Wheel Studs / Additional hardware are Not Included. This listing is for spacers only as pictured. [MATERIAL & MANUFACTURING] Spacers are CNC Machined to exact specifications from high quality Aerospace Billet Aluminum. Undergoes anodizing process to prevent surface corrosion and rust.

[PRODUCT BENEFITS] Our unique design reduces the weight of the spacers by 50% compared to other spacers on the market, which reduces unsprung weight and provides optimal performance. Hubcentric Bore fits perfectly around 60.1mm hubs to eliminate wobble or vibrations. Fixes clearance issues if your wheels are making contact with your shocks or brake calipers. Increases inner wheel well clearance to allow installation of wider rims/tires. Reduce / Eliminate pesky wheel & fender gap.

[INSTALLATION] Requires standard tire repair tools, a torque wrench, and lug socket. May need extended bolts/studs (not included). While installation is simple and most knowledgeable buyers can install themselves, we recommend professional installation especially if it's your first time installing auto parts. IMPORTANT SAFETY ADVISORY: Torque lug bolts/nuts to manufacturer specifications. Check and re-torque all hardware after 25-50 miles. See Description for additional install information.
